casebody.data:
State
v.
Zachary David Thomsen 308A15-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Bruce T. Cunningham, Jr., Attorney at Law, Southern Pines, for Thomsen, Zachary David. Anne M. Middleton, Special Deputy Attorney General, Maureen Krueger, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

*315The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of March 2016 by Defendant to Amend Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016."
